metadata.title: CVE-2022-26385 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In unusual circumstances, an individual thread may outlive the thread'smanager during shutdown. This could have led to a use-after-free causing apotentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 98.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26385` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 1:1snap1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1snap1-0ubuntu1').
